overview: The focus is on a group of design students who graduated from the Academy of Arts of Turkmenistan. After graduating from alma mater, each of them is busy with his own affairs, and is quite well arranged, but not in his specialty. Unrealized creative dreams do not give them peace and spiritual harmony.  - The plot reveals the life of the protagonist, his creative path and the eternal search for a muse. On one of the beautiful days, one of the heroes learns that a grandiose project is planned to be built in Ashgabat, and a competition is announced. Under this slogan, he unites his associates.
title: Binýat
